Mysterious Dark Knight:
Oh you who are led by Red Thread of Fate!
Obeying the call of destiny, you are returned to the tree of life umirayuschimu, dispelled the darkness of Shilen and Kamael sparked hope of heart. Touch the flame of the Temple Pa'agrian to each of the Orcs, and you'll find a path to Eternal Love.
You passed the test. Always be moving forward, determine their fate themselves.
Memorize this place, you no longer will have the occasion to see him again.
